Name: Cursed West
About the game: The game presents levels where you advance on a traditional way from left to right, where we must advance defeating enemies, also there's 3d levels were we must pass without raising suspicious and undetected There are also levels were we ride our horse and we must pass trough the level or survive The game will count with different possible endings, and 3 unlockable modes: - 'Boss rush mode':with added timer for beating the bosses -'Alternative campaign' :You can take control of an alternative character - 'Infinity':Wich adds 3 additional stages to the campaign And don't forget to find all the hidden items in the game!
